lines.text: How can one person be two persons and yet be the same person?
If I'm not me, who am I? And if I'm somebody else, why do I look like me?

[disquised as Popeye]
My dear man, is there but only one Washington?
And is there but only one Lincoln?
And is there but only one Popeye?
Then that settles it. I'M Popeye!

[to Popeye as she escorts Wimpy into her house]
You ought to be ashamed of yourself for looking like Popeye!
